attributes.additional_details:
The charges imposed on the needy and ill people is outlandish.
I speak mainly about the Charges for North Tees hospaital which has the most expensive charges in the Country netting the company in excess of £250m per year.
The Government is also urged to pllok into the practice of the company running the managment of this car park. Three Companies disolved in the past 2 1/2 years all with the same main name. The latest one being Creative parking Ltd, disolved Sept 2020
attributes.background: Take a closer look at Hospital parking charges

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330867
